name: Only Dumb Robots
description:
A company in the future is making a test for their AI's Only the Dumbest Robot can survive others will be deleted!

I highly recommend playing from windows build not WebGL 

Lütfen daha iyi bir tecrübe için windows versiyonunu indirip oynayın.

Known WebGL problems:

  • Less resolution
  • Wierd mouse behaviour
  • Portals are invisible
  • Snow is invisible

These problems are because of webGL they are not related to the game use windows verison for better experience.

Controlls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • E to pick up objects
  • F to throw objects

Thanks to Tom and Dreaming of Lost Ruins for making the musics for this game
